CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 27, 1945, pg. 13, reads: "Stepping Out - Another horse from the Louis stables stepped off to place in show. The horse carries the name of Stepping Fox, and here's Rider Elegar Harvey."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Elegar Harvey, holding reins of horse "Stepping Fox," standing in front of plaid blanket attached to wooden beams, in horse stall in Hunt Armory during horse show, closer version
